text: Esslingen am Neckar (Swabian: Esslenga am Negger or Neckor [ˈeslẽŋə]) is a city in southern Germany, in the state of Baden-Württemberg. It is on the river Neckar, about southeast of Stuttgart city center. Esslingen was a free imperial city for several centuries until it was annexed by Württemberg in 1802. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Cities in Baden- Württemberg Category:Imperial free cities Category:Esslingen (district)
title: Esslingen am Neckar
